title: Game Crashes, Havent played a Single Game.
body:
Hello, new player here. Wanted to try league and so far the game crashes the moment a match is about to start. I checked the log files and tried to make sense of it. Perhaps someone on here can help. I did follow the steps for the Crash and Set up. Clean boot, fresh install, everything is up to date that I'm aware of. I'm missing something.

Crash? What made it crash?

replies.body: These specific logs don't tell me a whole lot, but download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some more logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech guys can look into this with you individually to see what's up.
